programme.title: Ox-Head Village
programme.desc: Having launched a social media prank about a haunted building, three girls suddenly vanish. Rumors circulate that they were victims of The Ox-Head Village curse, triggering an investigation by two of their friends, desperate to find the truth.

programme.title: The Outwaters
programme.desc: An excursion to the Mojave Desert turns creepy when a group of campers starts to experience unexplained sounds, vibrations, and unnatural animal behavior. Then one night everything changes, sending the foursome on a mind-bending trip through terror.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.sub-title: We Forgot About the Zombies; Fungus; Better the Devil
programme.desc: A compilation of snack-sized horror films to disturb genre fans across the world.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.sub-title: Full Moon Glory Hole; Fried Barry; Writer's Block
programme.desc: Whatever you do, don't enter a glory hole on a Full Moon!; a heroin junkie trips from his latest hit.

programme.title: Housebound
programme.desc: A would-be thief (Morgana O'Reilly) is remanded to the custody of her estranged mother (Rima Te Wiata), who turns out to be correct in her assertion that evil spirits are afoot in their family domicile.

programme.title: American Mary
programme.desc: Mary Mason (Katharine Isabelle) is lured into a world of freakish surgeries for easy money.

programme.title: The Beyond
programme.desc: Gruesome deaths occur when a woman (Katherine MacColl) inherits a hotel that is one of seven gateways to hell.

programme.title: Cut Shoot Kill
programme.desc: Serena Brooks, an ambitious young actress, signs on as the star of a horror film with a crew of backwoods filmmakers. When the cast starts disappearing, Serena has to channel her character to survive.
